お座敷がかかる: (おざしきがかかる) - to be invited (often to perform for an audience); to be called
お座敷が掛かる: (おざしきがかかる) - to be invited (often to perform for an audience); to be called
お弁当つけて: (おべんとうつけて) - (joc) (usu. as a tease: お弁当つけてどこ行く の？) with rice stuck on one's face
お弁当付けて: (おべんとうつけて) - (joc) (usu. as a tease: お弁当つけてどこ行く の？) with rice stuck on one's face
お引き摺り: (おひきずり) - train of dress/trailing skirt; woman who doesn't work and only thinks about fashion
お引摺り: (おひきずり) - train of dress/trailing skirt; woman who doesn't work and only thinks about fashion
お強: (おこわ) - glutinous rice steamed with red beans or some other ingredient; trickery/deception
お強請り: (おねだり) - begging; pestering; pleading; coaxing
お弾き: (おはじき) - children's game similar to marbles, played with coin-shaped coloured glass; tiddlywink/counter
お役ごめん: (おやくごめん) - dismissal; firing; retirement; being relieved from one's post; being relieved of a burden
お役ご免: (おやくごめん) - dismissal; firing; retirement; being relieved from one's post; being relieved of a burden
お役御免: (おやくごめん) - dismissal; firing; retirement; being relieved from one's post; being relieved of a burden
お役所仕事: (おやくしょしごと) - bureaucratic routine; red tape
お待たせしました: (おまたせしました) - Thank you for waiting; Have I kept you waiting?
お待ち遠さま: (おまちどおさま) - I'm sorry to have kept you waiting
お待ち遠様: (おまちどおさま) - I'm sorry to have kept you waiting
お後がよろしいようで: (おあとがよろしいようで) - (from rakugo) that's all from me, and now the next speaker ...; expression used to hand over to the next speaker
お得: (おとく) - economical; bargain; good value; good-value
お得意さん: (おとくいさん) - regular customer; valued client
お得感: (おとくかん) - money-saving feeling; bargain feeling
お御籤: (おみくじ) - fortune slip (usu. bought at a shrine)
お御輿: (おみこし) - portable shrine (carried in festivals); buttocks/lower back/waist/hips
お徳: (おとく) - economical; bargain; good value; good-value
お忍び: (おしのび) - travelling incognito (traveling); special palanquin for carrying a daimyo or his wife incognito
お悔やみ申し上げます: (おくやみもうしあげます) - my condolences; my deepest sympathy
お悧巧: (おりこう) - well-behaved (of kids, animals, etc); obedient; good
お愛想: (おあいそう) - compliment/flattery; service/hospitality; bill (at a restaurant; formerly, not used by customers)/check
お慶び申しあげる: (およろこびもうしあげる) - (usu. 〜ます) to express pleasure on receiving news, etc.; to be glad to hear something
お慶び申し上げる: (およろこびもうしあげる) - (usu. 〜ます) to express pleasure on receiving news, etc.; to be glad to hear something
お成り: (おなり) - going out (of a nobleman, etc.); visiting
お手: (おて) - hand/arm; handwriting/penmanship; 'shake' (command to have a dog place its paw in your hand)
お手あげ: (おてあげ) - all over; given in; given up hope; bringing to knees; throwing up one's hands
お手つき: (おてつき) - touching a wrong card; making a mistress of a servant/mistress (who is one's servant)
お手の物: (おてのもの) - one's speciality; one's forte; one's own thing
お手上げ: (おてあげ) - all over; given in; given up hope; bringing to knees; throwing up one's hands
お手並み拝見: (おてなみはいけん) - let's see what you've got; show me what you've got
お手並拝見: (おてなみはいけん) - let's see what you've got; show me what you've got
お手付き: (おてつき) - touching a wrong card; making a mistress of a servant/mistress (who is one's servant)
お手元: (おてもと) - chopsticks (often written on the paper wrapper)
お手元金: (おてもときん) - the privy purse; the money used for private purposes by the members of the Imperial family
お手前: (おてまえ) - skill/dexterity/artistry/ingenuity; etiquette of tea-ceremony
お手数をおかけいたします: (おてすうをおかけいたします) - to be a burden; to make trouble for someone
お手数をおかけ致します: (おてすうをおかけいたします) - to be a burden; to make trouble for someone
お手柔らかに: (おてやわらかに) - Don't be too hard on me (us, them)
お手洗い: (おてあらい) - toilet; restroom; lavatory; bathroom
お手玉: (おてだま) - beanbag/beanbag juggling game; {baseb} bobbling the ball
お手盛り: (おてもり) - making arbitrary decisions which benefit oneself; self-approved plan
お手許: (おてもと) - chopsticks (often written on the paper wrapper)
お払い物: (おはらいもの) - goods to offer the junk dealer
お払い箱: (おはらいばこ) - discarding; firing (an employee)
お抓み: (おつまみ) - snack (to have with a drink); side dish
お持たせ: (おもたせ) - gift received from a visitor (usu. used when offering the visitor to partake of part of that gift)
お持たせ物: (おもたせもの) - gift received from a visitor (usu. used when offering the visitor to partake of part of that gift)
お持ち帰り: (おもちかえり) - one-night stand/taking home a woman from a bar, club, etc.; takeout (i.e. food)/take-out/takeaway/take-away
お持て成し: (おもてなし) - hospitality; reception; treatment; service; entertainment
お掛け下さい: (おかけください) - (and many other meanings of 掛ける) please sit down; please have a seat
お控えなすって: (おひかえなすって) - initial formal greeting between gamblers
お揃い: (おそろい) - same; matching; going together
お握り: (おにぎり) - rice ball (often triangular, sometimes with a filling and wrapped in nori)
お摘まみ: (おつまみ) - snack (to have with a drink); side dish
お摘み: (おつまみ) - snack (to have with a drink); side dish
お撮み: (おつまみ) - snack (to have with a drink); side dish
お数: (オカズ) - accompaniment for rice dishes/side dish; (おかず, オカズ only) (sometimes オガズ) food for thought (esp. in the context of conversation, or material for assisting arousal during masturbation)
お断り: (おことわり) - declining; nonacceptance; declination; refusal; rejection; turndown
お断わり: (おことわり) - declining; nonacceptance; declination; refusal; rejection; turndown
お旅所: (おたびどころ) - place where the sacred palanquin is lodged during a festival
お早う: (おはよう) - (from お早く; may be used colloquially at any time of day)  good morning
お早うございます: (おはようございます) - (may be used more generally at any time of day)  good morning
お晩: (おばん) - evening (used in greetings); good evening
お晩です: (おばんです) - good evening (greeting, e.g. in emails sent in the evening)
お晩彩: (おばんざい) - light Kyoto-style home cooking with boiled vegetables and marinated food, also now served in restaurants
お晩菜: (おばんざい) - light Kyoto-style home cooking with boiled vegetables and marinated food, also now served in restaurants
お暇: (おいとま) - leaving/going home; quitting one's job; free time/leisure/spare time
お暇なら: (おひまなら) - if you are free; if you have time to spare; if not otherwise engaged
